spellsword.name: Enchanted Longsword
spellsword.description: Use an enchanted longsword to restore your health during battle

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Lightsaber cuts through any Links or Grapples.

flametrap.name: Flame Trap
flametrap.description: Hold an enemy in place while you watch them burn.

effects.title: Silence
effects.text: Your enemy will be unable to cast spells for 0.75 seconds.

effects.title: Recharge
effects.text: If it hits, reduces cooldowns for all your spells except Ensnare by 4 seconds.

ft2.name: Flame Trap
ft2.description: Hold an enemy in place while you watch them burn.

effects.title: Silence
effects.text: Your enemy will be unable to cast spells for 0.75 seconds.

effects.title: Recharge
effects.text: If it hits, reduces cooldowns for all your spells except Ensnare by 4 seconds.

spear1.name: Spear
spear1.description: Poke fear into the hearts of your enemies!

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Spear pokes through any Links or Grapples.

spear2.name: Spear Charge
spear2.description: Poke fear into the hearts of your enemies!

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Spear pokes through any Links or Grapples.

bow.name: Arrow
bow.description: Shoot your enemies with an arrow!

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Accelerate quickly, knocking away anything in your path.

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: Clears all positive and negative effects.

effects.title: Void recharge
effects.text: Cools down 2x faster when in the void.

sword1.name: Longsword
sword1.description: For 1 second, swing your longsword to deflect projectiles and knockback enemies!

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Lightsaber cuts through any Links or Grapples.

shield1.name: Shield
shield1.description: Reflect away projectile attacks. Ineffective against area-of-effect spells.

trap.name: Trap
trap.description: Hold an enemy in place while you unleash your volleys upon them.

effects.title: Silence
effects.text: Your enemy will be unable to cast spells for 0.75 seconds.

effects.title: Recharge
effects.text: If it hits, reduces cooldowns for all your spells except Ensnare by 4 seconds.

bow2.name: Flaming Arrow
bow2.description: Takes 0.5 seconds to shrink to minimum damage, so keep a little bit of distance for maximum effect.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Passive ability. Your rage allows you to attack with increased effectiveness.

effects.title: Empowered
effects.text: Increase damage dealt by 10%.

sword2.name: Double Sword
sword2.description: Swing dual swords to deflect projectiles and knockback enemies!

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Sword cuts through any Links or Grapples.

blessing.name: Blessed
blessing.description: Passive ability. Dodge even more effectively.

effects.title: Fast
effects.text: Increase movement speed by 20%.

bird.name: Falcon
bird.description: Around and around you. Keep following your enemies at orbital distance until it hits.

armor1.name: Light Armor
armor1.description: Passive ability. Every atom in your body is imbued with inner strength.

effects.title: Resistant
effects.text: Reduce damage received by 10%. Applies to all forms of damage, including void damage.

spear2.1.name: Spear Charge
spear2.1.description: Poke fear into the hearts of your enemies!

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Spear pokes through any Links or Grapples.

spear2.2.description: Poke fear into the hearts of your enemies!

recoil.name: Long Longsword
recoil.description: Use an enchanted longsword to restore your health during battle

effects.title: Detach
effects.text: Lightsaber cuts through any Links or Grapples.

test.name: Magic
test.description: As long as your Horcrux is alive, you cannot die. The Horcrux will lifesteal from any nearby enemies, but will not kill them. Your Horcrux is fragile, so shoot it close to your enemy, but don't let it touch them or it will break!

tanky.name: Heavy
tanky.description: Passive ability. Less movement speed but more damage.

effects.title: Slow
effects.text: Decrease movement speed by 50%.
